long_description: The Yakima Raptor Aero is born from the heritage of their most popular upright bike mount, the LockJaw, and steps into the future with fit and function. Conveniently transports your bike without the hassle of removing a wheel; folds down when not in use. Fits a wide variety of bicycle down tube shapes and sizes between 1 - 3 in. in diameter; disc brake and thru axle compatible. Soft, padded Raptor Aero claws cradle bike tubes without harming paint finish. Includes universal mounting bracket that allows Raptor Aero to fit round, square and most factory crossbar rack systems. Raptor Aero tray is 52 in. long. Theft deterrence is provided by the addition of SKS lock cores (sold separately).
short_description: The Yakima Raptor Aero is born from the heritage of their most popular upright bike mount, the LockJaw, and steps into the future with fit and function.
